      - {{ .PublicKey }}

    hashed_passwd: {{ .RootPasswordHash }}
{{- end }}

  username: {{ .RhelUsername }}
  password: {{ .RhelPassword }}

write_files:
  - content: |
{{ .NodeadmConfigYaml | indent 6 }}
    path: nodeadm-config.yaml
{{ range $file := .Files }}
  - content: |
{{ $file.Content | indent 6 }}

{{if $file.Permissions}}

{{- end }}

runcmd:
  - ln -sf /run/log/journal /var/log/journal
  # Install Lustre client for FSx CSI driver support
  - |
    curl https://fsx-lustre-client-repo-public-keys.s3.amazonaws.com/fsx-rpm-public-key.asc -o /tmp/fsx-rpm-public-key.asc
    rpm --import /tmp/fsx-rpm-public-key.asc
    curl https://fsx-lustre-client-repo.s3.amazonaws.com/el/8/fsx-lustre-client.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/aws-fsx.repo
    dnf install -y kmod-lustre-client lustre-client
    echo -e "lnet\nlustre" > /etc/modules-load.d/lustre.conf
    depmod -a
    modprobe lnet
    modprobe lustre
  - /tmp/nodeadm-init.sh "{{ .NodeadmUrl }}" "{{ .KubernetesVersion }}" "{{ .Provider }}" "{{ .Region }}" "--containerd-source docker"
  - /tmp/nvidia-driver-install.sh

final_message: "The system is prepped, after $UPTIME seconds"
